quote: Well, Pete, the healthcare plan didn't go down. We have the votes, but reconciliation is a disaster, but as you know it ends on Friday, so we don't have enough time because we have one senator who is a yes vote -- a great person -- but he's in the hospital, and he's a yes vote, so we can't do it by Friday. So we have the votes, we will do it sometime at the beginning of the year, but to the election in November.
quotePlain: Well, Pete, the healthcare plan didn’t go down. We have the votes, but reconciliation is a disaster, but as you know it ends on Friday, so we don’t have enough time because we have one senator who is a yes vote – a great person – but he’s in the hospital, and he’s a yes vote, so we can’t do it by Friday. So we have the votes, we will do it sometime at the beginning of the year, but to the election in November.
name: Donald Trump
where: interview with Pete Hegseth on Fox & Friends

claims.title: Republicans had enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy
claims.negative: Republicans did not have enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy
claims.negativePlain: Republicans did not have enough votes to pass Graham-Cassidy

claims.title: Thad Cochran couldn't vote on a healthcare bill since he was in the hospital

claims.negativePlain: Thad Cochran wasn’t in the hospital and could have voted on a healthcare bill
claims.truth: He was recovering at home, not in a hospital, and would have made arrangements to vote.
